description: The nation’s highest court faced a far-reaching list of cases that renewed its central role in American life.
title: The Supreme Court’s Biggest Decisions in 2018
title_page: The Supreme Court’s Biggest Decisions in 2018 - The New York Times
text:
Gay Rights and Religion
The court ruled in favor of a Colorado baker who refused to create a wedding cake for a gay couple. The court said the baker had been mistreated by a state civil rights commission based on remarks of one of its members indicating hostility to religion.
